text: Ilanz () is a town and former municipality of the district of Surselva in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2014, the former municipalities of Ilanz, Castrisch, Ladir, Luven, Pitasch, Riein, Ruschein, Schnaus, Sevgein, Duvin, Pigniu, Rueun and Siat merged into the new municipality of Ilanz/Glion. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Ilanz
